page.title: Home
page.description: Welcome to the Nuxt 3 Starter Template. Build amazing applications with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and more.

hero.title: Build amazing applications with
hero.subtitle: A modern Nuxt 3 starter template with everything you need to build production-ready applications. Features TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, authentication, and more.
hero.features_title: Everything you need to get started

typescript.title: TypeScript Ready
typescript.description: Built with TypeScript for better developer experience and type safety.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Beautiful, responsive design with utility-first CSS framework.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Complete authentication system with login and registration forms.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Multi-language support with organized locale structure.

components.title: UI Components
components.description: Pre-built components with shadcn/ui for consistent design.

devtools.title: Developer Tools
devtools.description: ESLint, Prettier, and development tools for better code quality.

pinia.title: State Management
pinia.description: Pinia for state management, making it easy to manage application state.

cta.title: Ready to start building?
cta.description: Get started with our comprehensive starter template and build your next application today.
